comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 64848937@N00
comment._content: Seat of the Butler family in Ireland for centuries and open to the public as a National Monument.

comment.author: 29196427@N06
comment._content: i live nearby..it is the most beautiful building. completely restored and has cool park and grounds. it is really clean outside and has no ivy anymore...you can sit by the river opposite in the river court hotel, drink a guinness and watch the world go by and the sun set over the castle
